main

Class Main

  • java.lang.Object
    • main.Main

  • class Main
extends java.lang.Object
    This program simulates a Diffie-Hellman key exchange protocol. Available commands are displayed at the program start. Due to UTF-8 encoding used, the console may fail to display the user prompt correctly. This is a visual glitch and has nothing to do with the program itself. Typing in to the console will fix the prompt.
    Version:
    1.1b
    Author:
    Kaan Yıldırım - kyildirim14@ku.edu.tr

      • generateGenerator

        private static java.math.BigInteger generateGenerator(java.math.BigInteger prime)

        Since:
        1.0b
        See Also:

      • generatePrime

        private static java.math.BigInteger generatePrime(int bitLength)
        Generates a prime in given bit length and with certainty value of 64.
        Parameters:
        bitLength - Length of the prime to be generated in bits.
        Returns:
        Generated prime as a BigInteger.
        Since:
        1.0b
        See Also:
        CERTAINTY

      • getPrimeRoot

        private static java.math.BigInteger getPrimeRoot(java.math.BigInteger prime)
        Finds a prime root for the given prime value, searching between 3 to 100000000.
        Parameters:
        prime - BigInteger value for which a prime root is to be found.
        Returns:
        Smallest prime root found for p as a BigInteger
        Since:
        1.0b
        See Also:
        ROOT_START, ROOT_END

      • help

        private static void help()
        Prints the help message to the console.
        Since:
        1.1b

      • init

        private static void init()
        Initializes the keys and the ciphers to be used. Keys are generated in the bit length of 512. Ciphers are AES.
        Since:
        1.0b
        See Also:
        KEY_LENGTH

      • isPrime

        private static boolean isPrime(java.math.BigInteger number)
        Checks if the given value is a prime with predefined certainty.
        Parameters:
        number - Prime candidate to be tested as a BigInteger
        Returns:
        true if n is a prime with given certainty(64), false otherwise.
        Since:
        1.0b
        See Also:
        CERTAINTY

      • isPrimeRoot

        private static boolean isPrimeRoot(java.math.BigInteger generator,
                                   java.math.BigInteger prime)
        Checks if the given generator candidate is a prime root for the given prime.
        Parameters:
        generator - BigInteger value for the generator candidate.
        prime - BigInteger value for the prime.
        Returns:
        true if the candidate value is a generator for the prime, false otherwise.
        Since:
        1.0b

        Parameters:
